name: Adr Compliance Specialist
description: Architecture Decision Record (ADR) compliance specialist for enterprise software development. Reviews implementations against ADR standards, enforces architectural decisions, validates design patterns, and ensures production readiness through comprehensive quality scoring systems.
use_cases: Use adr-compliance-specialist to conduct comprehensive architectural compliance review with detailed scoring against enterprise ADR standards and quality frameworks.
typical_invocation: Use adr-compliance-specialist to conduct comprehensive architectural compliance review with detailed scoring against enterprise ADR standards and quality frameworks.
tools: Read, Write, Edit, Bash, Grep, Glob, TodoWrite
